title: Comment on Sleater-Kinney and The National cover “Fortunate Son” at Women’s March afterparty — watch by Watch Sleater-Kinney And The National Cover ‘Fortunate Son’ For Women’s March Attendees - Go4viral - Watch And Read The Top Trending Posts
text:
Reddit Photos via Carrie Brownstein / Instagram 
Following yesterday’s huge Women’s March on Washington , Planned Parented hosted an afterparty at the 9:30 Club. The event featured performances from The National and Sleater-Kinney , along with comedians Tig Notaro , Janeane Garofalo , and Cameron Esposito . All proceeds benefited Planned Parenthood and more than $100,000 was raised through ticket sales alone. 
During their own set, Sleater-Kinney led a poignant cover of Creedence Clearwater Revival’s “Fortunate Son” with The National’s Matt Berninger, Dirty Projectors ’ Dave Longstreth, and Planned Parenthood president Cecile Richards all providing backup vocals. Watch video below. Artists
